reviewText: Very happy with this product, a great resource of ideas, tactics and set plays for both beginner and advanced coach alike.

Video has numerous set plays for different situations (kick in defensive, kick in offensive, corner).  The plays are described graphically, then demonstrated by a young team. Good video for a futsal coach looking for some set play ideas.

I agree with Futsal Lover, the DVD offers loads of sample set plays and they are explained in sufficient detail. The level of the exercises is quite high so I would recommend it for skilled Juniors and ambitious Senior teams, mainly. Good work!

It's a a great piece of work. Lots of great plays that could be used by any age group at any level.
Very well explained and detailed.
